name: Ridge Racer V
description:
Ridge Racer V is a racing game developed by NAMCO. It came out on 04-03-2000. It was published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Ridge Racer V has a Metascore of 78, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Ridge Racer V on PlayStation 2.
Kohta Takahashi, Mijk van Dijk, Nobuyoshi Sano and Yū Miyake scored the game.
